testcase.name: Test Case 1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then User verifies that home page is visible successfully...................passed Then User clicks on 'Signup / Login' button.................................passed Then User verifies 'New User Signup!' is visible............................passed Then User enters name and email address.....................................passed Then User clicks 'Signup' button............................................passed Then User verifies that 'ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION' is visible..............passed Then User fills details: Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth........passed Then User selects checkbox1 'Sign up for our newsletter!'...................passed Then User selects checkbox2 'Receive special offers from our partners!'.....passed Then User fills details: First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number.passed Then User clicks 'Create Account button'....................................passed
